page.title: 15Events
page.content: On July 13th 1985 a SPORTS and CARNIVAL is held for the childrenof the village.Both young and old dress up and hope to win a prize. BRING and BUYS are held to raise money for the Church and Chapel.Last January we held one to raise money for Ethiopia. In June an ITS A KNOCKOUT is held and every one joins in the games.Many teams compete. A GYMANFA GANU - a singing festival is held.For the GYMANFA BWNC childrenare asked questions about the Bible and also have a passage to learn from the Bible. A HARVEST THANKSGIVING is every Autumn and the Church is decorated with flowers,fruit,vegetables and sheaves of corn. At Christmas parties are held and presents given to the children.
